theJungle:PetSnecko.NAME: Pet Snecko
theJungle:PetSnecko.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Randomize the cost of all cards in your hand this turn.

theJungle:SS_Bright.NAME: Bright Spores
theJungle:SS_Bright.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add !M! Dazed into your discard pile.

theJungle:SS_Leeching.NAME: Leeching Spores
